Package com.example.queueup.viewmodels

Class EventArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
com.example.queueup.viewmodels.EventArrayAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminEventArrayAdapter, AttendeeEventArrayAdapter, OrganizerEventArrayAdapter
public abstract class EventArrayAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
Abstract adapter class for displaying a list of events, extending ArrayAdapter to provide a custom view for each event. It is intended to be subclassed to provide specific click handling for different user roles (e.g., Admin, Attendee).

  • Method Details

    • getView

      @RequiresApi(api=26) @NonNull public android.view.View getView(int position, @Nullable android.view.View convertView, @NonNull android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Inflates and populates the view for an event at the specified position. Sets up the event name, date, location, and banner image using data from the Event object.
      Specified by:
      getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
      Overrides:
      getView in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the event in the list
      convertView - the old view to reuse, if possible
      parent - the parent view group
      Returns:
      the view representing the event item
